extendedInfo.description: Metal Gear Soundboard is dedicated to all the fans of Metal Gear Solid Game made by Hideo Kojima and Konami in 1998.NEW VERSION (v0.9) 02-11-2013 MORE DEVICES ARE NOW SUPPORTED AND NEW FEATURES AVAILABLE!!!*IMPORTANT FOR ALL FANS:This is the BETA VERSION (v0.6), so some DEVICES may NOT BE SUPPORTED.PLEASE WAIT ;) for the FINAL VERSION before giving a NEGATIVE FEEDBACK, THANKS! :)IN APP:With more than 200 High Quality Sounds of the most famous characters of MGS1:Solid Snake, Liquid Snake, Meryl, Sniper Wolf, Revolver Ocelot, Gray Fox, Psycho Mantis, Vulcan Raven, Otaconâ¦COPYRIGHT:This is a Fan Made Project;CimaWebDesign, has all original copies of Metal Gear games, in the respect of Game Developers.The content of this app is for the "purpose of fair use" and there are no copyright infringement.CONTENT:All content is edited by CimaWebDesign, like: Audio, Images, Intro...CREDITS:All credits of this app should go to "KOJIMA PRODUCTIONS" and to "KONAMI", for having made Metal Gear.NOTE:This app is in BETA version, if you find any bugs report to us:http://www.cimawebdesign.com/app/metal-gear-solid-soundboard/Thank you! :)MORE FREE APPS:Get Your Lovehttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.cimawebdesign.getyourloveBig Ronnie Coleman Soundboardhttps://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.com.cimawebdesign.bigronniecolemansoundboardKEYWORDS:meatal gear solid, metal gear solid soundboard, metal gear soundboard, metal gear rising, metal gear solid rising, metal gear rising soundboard, metal gear snake eater, metal gear solid ground zeroes, metal gear ground zeroes, metal gear sons of liberty, sons of liberty, metal gear solid sons of liberty, metal gear solid portable ops, metal gear portable ops, metal gear solid guns of patriots, cimawebdesign, metal gear guns of patriots, metal gear solid peace walker, metal gear peace walker, metal gear special missions, metal gear substance, metal gear solid the twin snakes, metal gear the twin snakes, metal gear solid subsistence, metal gear solid mobile, metal gear solid touch, metal gear rising revengeance, metal gear acid, cheats metal gear, metal gear ringtone, metal gear tune, metal gear solid ringtone, metal gear wallpaper, metal gear solid wallpaper, metal gear music, metal gear songs, metal gear solid music, metal gear solid songs, metal gear tips, story metal gear, metal gear gudie, guides metal gear, tips metal gear solid, mgs 1, mgs 2, mgs 3, mgs 4, metal gear solid 1, metal gear solid 2, metal gear solid 3, metal gear solid 4, metal gear solid 5, metal gear solid v, snake eater, big boss, snake big boss, rising, metal gear solid cheats, metal gear cheats, metal gear solid guide, metal gear guide, metal gear tutorial, metal gear psx, metal gear playstation, metal gear playstation 2, metal gear playstation 3, metal gear android, metal gear xbox 360, metal gear pc, playstation, playstation 2, playstation 3, pc, xbox 360

reviews.title: I was a start
reviews.comment: Well firft off the auto could have been better because I also had a little more effort work into itsurly if I wanted this to be over in tone I think they should be added more to it overall. It was good.

reviews.title: Excellent library...
reviews.comment: But it\'s useless to me if I want to make it a ring tone or notification.... Launch takes too long also.
reviews.author: Niheim Em

reviews.title: Thanks I Love IT!
reviews.comment: Very nice! Audio quality is very good! Nice! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: This is put together really well
reviews.comment: I love how i can listen to the best song ever while listening to clips from the greatest game ever. Thank you so freakin much people that made this. I have listened for hours straight
reviews.author: Michael Bagley

reviews.title: Background song name???
reviews.comment: I won\'t give it six stars because it doesn\'t include a download of the background song. What\'s the name of ittttt????
reviews.author: Ariel Guevara

reviews.title: Not great
reviews.comment: Epic load times, not the greatest sounds and for some reason needs GPS access? No thanks.
reviews.author: simon perkins

reviews.title: Very well done!!
reviews.comment: If you\'re a fan of Metal Gear from PS1 then you will love this app. It\'s not like the normal soundboards.. its extremely well done!!! Great work
reviews.author: Beau Leaney

reviews.title: This app is awesome!
reviews.comment: If you\'re a true MGS fan, you will enjoy this! Thanks
reviews.author: Courtland Barber

reviews.title: Was very surprised!
reviews.comment: It is a very well built app. Made me the same way as I did when  you went back to shadow Moses in mgs 4! Ahh the nostalgia they made you feel
reviews.author: Thomas Diehl

reviews.title: Metal Gear Memories
reviews.comment: Well made high quality app.  A lot of love for this series.  From the beginning.
reviews.author: Randall Hull

reviews.title: Metal gear!
reviews.comment: Nice job the music makes it better some of these quotes give me goosebumps it would be good if you added more sounds any mgs fan get this Thanks!
reviews.author: james corrigan

reviews.title: Nexus 4
reviews.comment: 10,000 download this app. Respect from all my heart luv ya guys. Metal gear ps1 will never be made again. That game is legendary
reviews.author: Mahmoud Eliwa

reviews.title: Master miller
reviews.comment: Snake youve got to think. Your mind is your most dangerous weapon. All the quotes no master miller
reviews.author: Andrew Pantlin

reviews.title: Fantastica!!
reviews.comment: Bellissima app una delle poche soundboard che vedo realizzata veramente come si deve! ;)

reviews.title: I love it
reviews.comment: I am a true metal gear fan and I love anything that has to do with it. I like the song when you first start the app, it\'s the song at the end of MGS 1 I love it.
reviews.author: rhadames garcia

reviews.title: Epic
reviews.comment: Best Mgs soudboard till now. I wish I could rate it more than 5 stars.
reviews.author: Faizan Qazi

reviews.title: Great memories
reviews.comment: Love this app. Took a while to get going but it works fine and its been great listening to all these clips and remembering playing it as a kid. Still have the game. Thx for the monitors :)
reviews.author: Steve Padgham

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Great for any mgs fan would be nice to save tho

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I used to have every metal gear japannese and american copy but people stole them but im still trying to beat snake eater but great audio
